title: Use the iAsset API in R
text: goal iassetR interact iAsset api using R. Currently reading iAsset API possible. intend expand scope writing data well somewhat securely possible. package developed use case VespaWatch, uses iAsset umbrella RIPARIAS project. Early development wider use, beyond even limits RIPARIAS, envissioned resulting name change vespawatchR iassetR. current version package usable users iAsset however keep mind tested vespawatch use. encounter issues please raise issue.
